subject: College World Series
lead_paragraph: Bobby Shore pitched four-hit ball for eight innings, Cody Reine hit two three-run homers and Oklahoma pounded Virginia, 11-0, in Charlottesville, Va., to earn its first trip to the College World Series in 15 years.
